name: Platformer2d (alanenpee)
description:
Hi, game dev student here. I'm testing my custom controller in this demo of my platformer project. The current build has only one small scene and is in very early state. Please leave a small review after playing. I'll upload a more complete version of the demo soon.

How To Play:o

Movement - WASD

Jump - Press/Hold SPACE

Run - Hold LEFT SHIFT

Pause = P
